pageProps.content:
Experience

Omaanda is a unique lodge located within a private nature reserve a short drive from Windhoek’s Hosea Kutako International & Eros Domestic Airports.
Omaanda is the ideal stop-over before or after a Namibia safari & especially an ideal choice for guests who are looking for a nature-based stay, away from the city’s hustle & bustle.
Set in a 9,000-hectare Namibian wilderness, guests will have privileged access to a conservation reserve that offers incredible wildlife viewing & an authentic, local experience.

Stay

There are 10 air-conditioned thatched chalets at Omaanda, each modelled on local Owambo huts & featuring en-suite bathrooms.
Two of these chalets are larger & can sleep up to 6 guests, making them ideal for families.
The lodge has a traditional feel but is modern in design – offering world-class facilities such as Wi-Fi, a Bluetooth television in each room, a heated pool & a wellness spa.
The main lodge is home to an open-sided lounge, bar & dining area as well as an outdoor deck with a heated swimming pool & sun loungers offering spectacular views over the hills & mountains.

Activities

Guests staying at Omaanda can enjoy game drives, leopard-, elephant- or rhino- tracking, sunrise meerkat visits or spending time with orphaned or injured animals at the Shiloh Wildlife Sanctuary.
Day trips into Windhoek can also be arranged.

subfolders.title: Hilton Windhoek
subfolders.description: The Hilton Windhoek is located within the heart of Windhoek, Namibia’s capital city.  The hotel promises modern, lavish accommodation & world-renowned hospitality. The Hilton brand is renowned for its excellent hospitality, good choice of restaurants, luxurious accommodation & family-friendly atmosphere – it is no wonder that many discerning travellers choose to spend a few nights here.

subfolders.title: The Olive Exclusive
subfolders.description: Contemporary & stylish, The Olive Exclusive is tucked away in a quiet corner of Windhoek – Namibia’s capital city. Small & intimate, The Olive Exclusive is a luxurious choice for the discerning traveller hoping to stay over in Windhoek before or after a Namibia safari, & the ideal base from which to explore the city & surrounds.
